node.title: Meet the man who sold his house to buy a record press
node.alt: A smiling bearded man holding a vinyl record
node.description: Neil Wilson is pinning his hopes on the "strong energy" of Brisbane's music scene andÂ music lovers' passion for vinyl as he jumps into the record business.
node.content:
["While Brisbane homeowners cash in on the frantic housing market by selling up and purchasing elsewhere, Neil Wilson has sold his Ashgrove home for a different reason \u2013 to buy a record press.", "After decades in architecture and project management, with music as a passion but not a career, he's starting a record pressing company from scratch.", "\"Collectively me and my wife were both looking for change. We were both looking for something different. We'd been in our house for a long time, it needed some work, and I didn't want to do that work,\" he said.", "\"So we sold the house. It's paid for most of it, we're financing some of it. It's a gamble. But it's a gamble we believe in.\"", "
Local press for local music
", "The vinyl record press is one of only a handful set to operate in Australia.", "The press is being manufactured by a Hong Kong company in Guangzhou, through Italian press company MCS Sironi.", "\"We've done the sums, we've spoken to a lot of people and done forecasts, worked really closely with accountants and \u2026 people in the industry, and we believe in it,\" he said.", "Mr Wilson said he wasn't yet comfortable releasing the total amount for the press, as the costs for secondary equipment were still being finalised.", "Last year Melbourne company Program Records purchased Australia's first new record presses in 30 years,\u00a0which according to The Age cost $400,000.", "", "
Many people are returning to vinyl instead of streaming.(ABC Radio Brisbane: Lucy Stone)
", "The demand shown by Program Records and industry stalwart Zenith, also in Melbourne, inspired Mr Wilson to take his half-thought-out idea of buying a record press more seriously.", "\"I think Brisbane feels like there's this whole new music scene kicking off,\" he said.", "\"It reminds me a lot of when I moved down to Brisbane in the late '80s and there was a great scene in the late '80s and early '90s. There were venues down in the Valley, Festival Hall was still going \u2013 there was upstairs at Dooleys.", "
Vinyl resurgence
", "Given the popularity of streaming services and the easy availability of music on YouTube and other services, buying a record press could seem like a retrograde step, but Mr Wilson is confident the nostalgia of vinyl won't fade.", "The Australian Recording Industry Association (ARIA) recognised the return of vinyl in 2019 when it introduced a vinyl albums chart.", "Singer Adele alone has clogged up much of the world's vinyl press availability with her order of 500,000 vinyls of her newest album 30.", "", "
Vinyl has now outstripped CDs in popularity.(ABC Radio Brisbane: Lucy Stone)
", "Mr Wilson said he wasn't planning to aim that high, but he hoped local bands would appreciate having his business near at hand to press their work.", "\"I keep coming across these incredible bands \u2013 mostly young, some not so young, and some of these bands, they're playing a couple of gigs a week to a couple of hundred people. They all know each other, there just seems to be this really strong energy in that scene in Brisbane.", "\"Because of that we very much want this to be a Brisbane business.\"", "According to Mr Wilson, sitting\u00a0down with an album crafted by a musician deliberately to be listened to from start to finish, listening to the crackle and hiss beneath the music\u00a0is part of the romance of vinyl.", "And it seems the music streaming industry is also recognising that, with Spotify bowing to Adele's request to remove the \"shuffle\"\u00a0button from its app to allow people to listen to her work in its intended order.", "", "
Vintage LPs can be hot property, while new vinyl is increasingly popular.(ABC Radio Brisbane: Lucy Stone)
", "\"One of the reasons I got back into vinyl in the early 2010s was that I got tired where there was a remote handy and I'd just skip tracks,\" he said.", "\"Whereas I put an album on and I listen to it, and I really enjoy that. I feel like I'm hearing what the artist was trying to portray, a story.\"", "
Pressing forward
", "While the press itself is being built in China, Mr Wilson is looking about Brisbane for its future home, perhaps on the south side which is known for its long punk-rock legacy.", "He expects the press to arrive in January or February, COVID permitting, with support from the Hong Kong company to commission it after that.", "\"We're hoping we're going to be up and pressing in March/April, that's what we'd like,\" he said."]
